title: Is the USA lying about the COVID-19 data? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on how you define “USA.” Donald Trump, the USA’s president, has lied about the coronavirus for months now. Here’s a summary of what he’s said about the coronavirus: January 20: "I know more about viruses than anyone.” January 22: “We have it totally under control. It’s one person coming in from China. It’s going to be just fine.” February 2: “We pretty much shut it down coming in from China.” February 24: “The Coronavirus is very much under control in the USA… Stock Market starting to look very good to me!” February 25: “CDC and my Administration are doing a GREAT job of handling Coronavirus.” February 25: “I think that's a problem that’s going to go away… They have studied it. They know very much. In fact, we’re very close to a vaccine.” February 26: “The 15 (cases in the US) within a couple of days is going to be down to close to zero.” February 26: “We're going very substantially down, not up.” February 27: “One day it’s like a miracle, it will disappear.” February 28: “We're ordering a lot of supplies. We're ordering a lot of, uh, elements that frankly we wouldn't be ordering unless it was something like this. But we're ordering a lot of different elements of medical.” March 2: “You take a solid flu vaccine, you don't think that could have an impact, or much of an impact, on corona?” March 2: “A lot of things are happening, a lot of very exciting things are happening and they’re happening very rapidly.” March 4: “If we have thousands or hundreds of thousands of people that get better just by, you know, sitting around and even going to work — some of them go to work, but they get better.” March 5: “I NEVER said people that are feeling sick should go to work.” March 5: “The United States… has, as of now, only 129 cases… and 11 deaths. We are working very hard to keep these numbers as low as possible!” March 6: “I think we’re doing a really good job in this country at keeping it down… a tremendous job at keeping it down.” March 6: “Anybody right now, and yesterday, anybody that needs a test gets a test. They’re there. And the tests are beautiful…. the tests are all perfect like the letter was perfect. The transcription was perfect. Right? This was not as perfect as that but pretty good.” March 6: “I like this stuff. I really get it. People are surprised that I understand it… Every one of these doctors said, ‘How do you know so much about this?’ Maybe I have a natural ability. Maybe I should have done that instead of running for president.” March 24: "I would love to have the country opened up and just raring to go by Easter." "I gave it two weeks"

There is a lot of lying going around now, because pertinate (inconvenient) information is being suppressed. The initial assumptions about the virus were wrong. I do not know if that was deliberate or not (there seems to be indications of ‘deliberateness’) but since then we have learned the facts and NOW there is actual lying, people KNOWING the facts and deliberately suppressing or obscuring them. There seems to be several ‘agendas’ perpetuating these lies… Power, prestige, money to be made (quadrillions with (ineffective) vaccines and population control). Bill Gates is setting himself up to be the richest man on the planet. If you look at the actual science instead of the ‘theroretical statistics’ presented by the (very effective) fear mongers, you’ll quickly realize that no further testing needs to be done. That it’s time to STOP wasting time and money pandering to the fearful. Testing that has already been done (over 12 independent studies now) show that the actual mortality of this virus is equal to or less than a normal flu season. The only reason we ‘locked down’ was to ‘flatten the curve’ to prevent hospital ventilators from being ‘over-run’.Note that ‘flatten the curve’ does not mean ‘less people infected’. It only means ‘spread the infection out over a longer time’. Now that we know that:1. Ventilators are the WRONG TREATMENT for this virus2. There are now effective, inexpensive treatments for the virus 3. Treated properly there is near zero mortality 4. Hospitals are near empty, with Doctors and nurses being laid off5. the Lock Down is killing more people than the virus ever could No further testing needed (although I’m sure this will be the most ‘researched’ virus in history. This pathogen will fade into the background as our immune systems adapt and develop ‘herd immunity’, just as has been happening for millions of years. Time to admit we grossly over-reacted, take a deep breath (ignore the fear mongers) and go back to normal.
